attributes.action: Immigrants who commit crime should be deported
attributes.additional_details: People who come to Great Britain and Northern Ireland to work and then break our laws should be deported . There is enough crime in our communities without letting more criminals in or people who think are justice system is so lenient they have no fear in breaking laws here. Far to much money is spent on court cases and legal aid for foreigners. To many of our own people are feeling the effects of foreign national crime.
